detaileddescription.para: Metering is done based on packets
Metering is done based on bytes
RFC 2697, Single Rate Three color marker, CIR, CBS and PBS, G, Y and R
RFC 2698, Two Rate Three color marker, CIR, CBS, PIR and PBS, G, Y and R
Storm control mode. Single Rate Two color CIR, CBS, G and R

briefdescription.para: Enum defining mode of the policer object.

simplesect.title: Value Type:\n @@type sai_meter_type_t @par Flags:\n @@flags MANDATORY_ON_CREATE | CREATE_ONLY
Value Type:\n @@type sai_policer_mode_t @par Flags:\n @@flags MANDATORY_ON_CREATE | CREATE_ONLY

Value Type:
 @@type sai_policer_color_source_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_ONLY @par Default value:
 @@default SAI_POLICER_COLOR_SOURCE_AWARE

briefdescription.para: Committed burst size bytes/packets based on SAI_POLICER_ATTR_METER_TYPE.

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_uint64_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Default value:
 @@default 0

briefdescription.para: Committed information rate BPS/PPS based on SAI_POLICER_ATTR_METER_TYPE.

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_uint64_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Default value:
 @@default 0

briefdescription.para: Peak burst size bytes/packets based on SAI_POLICER_ATTR_METER_TYPE.

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_uint64_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Default value:
 @@default 0

briefdescription.para: Peak information rate BPS/PPS based on SAI_POLICER_ATTR_METER_TYPE.

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_uint64_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Default value:
 @@default 0 @par Valid only when:
 @@validonly SAI_POLICER_ATTR_MODE == SAI_POLICER_MODE_TR_TCM

briefdescription.para: Action to take for Green color packets.

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_packet_action_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Default value:
 @@default SAI_PACKET_ACTION_FORWARD

briefdescription.para: Action to take for Yellow color packets.

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_packet_action_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Default value:
 @@default SAI_PACKET_ACTION_FORWARD

briefdescription.para: Action to take for RED color packets.

detaileddescription.para: For storm control action should be used as red packet action.

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_packet_action_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Default value:
 @@default SAI_PACKET_ACTION_FORWARD

detaileddescription.para: Default disabled. Modify list needs full new set.

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_s32_list_t sai_packet_action_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Default value:
 @@default empty

Value Type:
 @@type sai_object_stage_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_ONLY @par Default value:
 @@default SAI_OBJECT_STAGE_BOTH
